task.title: Vegan Eggs Recipe
task.shortdesc: These "eggs" can be paired with any choosings of your liking, such as toast, fruits, etc.

taskbody.prereq:
Materials for this recipe include a large skillet and a stovetop. The ingredients are as follows:
2 (16 oz.) packages of firm or extra firm tofu packed in water
2 tablespoons of vegan margarine (such as Earth Balance)
2½ tablespoons of nutritional yeast
1¼ teaspoons of granulated garlic
1¼ teaspoons of granulated onion
¾ teaspoon of pink or sea salt (or more to taste)
½ teaspoon of black pepper (or more to taste)
⅛ teaspoon of turmeric

step.cmd: Open the two packages of tofu, and drain the water.
Add the margarine to a large skillet, and turn the heat to medium.
Crumble the tofu into the pan, and toss with the margarine.
Sprinkle the onion, garlic, turmeric, salt, and pepper over the tofu, and stir to mix.
Cook on medium for approximately 5 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
step.info: Use a lower heat if using a cast iron skillet.

step.cmd: When most of the water is cooked out of the tofu, add nutritional yeast and fold it into the tofu.
Continue to cook over a medium heat. If you desire browning, let the tofu cook on one side, and then use a spatula to turn it over. Continue this process until desired amount of browning is achieved.
Serve as is, or add any extra toppings or seasonings of your choice!
